title: Ping Pong Clone
description: This project is a virtual clone of the Ping Pong game, played between a human player and an AI player.

title: Analysing Twitter Trends
description: A full-stack application that queries the Twitter API for 500 recent tweets and visualises the result as a word cloud.

title: Craviour
description: This project is a food delivery website built using the MERN Stack.

title: Minesweeper Game
description: The classic Minesweeper game implemented in Python using the Tkinter library.

title: Kanban Board
description: This project is a visual workflow management tool that helps individuals visualize and manage tasks.

title: SustainED
description: Built at a hackathon, this project aims to promote a more sustainable lifestyle to university students, using a rewards system.
